channel.title: Help with Zenithscape 718!
channel.description:
I'm pretty sure I fixed the compiler to match my JDK version and I set my Environment Variables. So what do I do now ? When I click on my run.bat in my server sided folder i get this cmd prompt.
Initing Cache - some other list of stuff Server ran in 3000 milli seconds - or something like that
So i click run in my client side and I get another cmd prompt but this one is empty, then the game client opens, but its just a black screen. How do make it so i can actually login ? I need to login so I can code the server and make it original. I'm not worried about portfowarding yet, I'll do that later. But for now can you please help me, if there is a step im missing or I need to do something else please tell me.
also when i look for loader.java i see a file called hjhkh.bat , its contains
@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_10/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/cache/*.java src/com/rs/cache/loaders/*.java src/com/rs/cores/*.java src/com/rs/game/*.java src/com/rs/game/item/*.java src/com/rs/game/minigames/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/impl/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/corp/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dragons/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dungeonnering/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/familiar/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/bandos/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/barrows/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/saradomin/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zammorak/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zaros/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/kalph/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/others/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/slayer/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/rooms/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/controlers/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/actions/*.java src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/*.java src/com/rs/game/tasks/*.java src/com/rs/*.java src/com/rs/io/*.java src/com/rs/net/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/*.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/*.java src/com/rs/net/encoders/*.java src/com/rs/tools/*.java src/com/rs/utils/*.java src/com/rs/utils/huffman/*.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/armadyl/*.java pause
do i have to do anything to that

item.title: Help with Zenithscape 718!
item.dc:creator: @PvM_Micro PvM Micro
item.description:
@PvM_Micro wrote:

I’m pretty sure I fixed the compiler to match my JDK version and I set my Environment Variables. So what do I do now ? When I click on my run.bat in my server sided folder i get this cmd prompt.

Initing Cache - some other list of stuff
Server ran in 3000 milli seconds - or something like that

So i click run in my client side and I get another cmd prompt but this one is empty, then the game client opens, but its just a black screen. How do make it so i can actually login ? I need to login so I can code the server and make it original. I’m not worried about portfowarding yet, I’ll do that later. But for now can you please help me, if there is a step im missing or I need to do something else please tell me.

also when i look for loader.java i see a file called hjhkh.bat , its contains

@echo off
title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_10/bin/javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/; -sourcepath src src/com/rs/.java src/com/rs/cache/.java src/com/rs/cache/loaders/.java src/com/rs/cores/.java src/com/rs/game/.java src/com/rs/game/item/.java src/com/rs/game/minigames/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/combat/impl/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/corp/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dragons/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/dungeonnering/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/familiar/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/bandos/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/barrows/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/saradomin/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zammorak/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/zaros/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/kalph/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/others/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/slayer/.java src/com/rs/game/player/.java src/com/rs/game/player/actions/.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/.java src/com/rs/game/player/content/dungeoneering/rooms/.java src/com/rs/game/player/controlers/.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/.java src/com/rs/game/player/cutscenes/actions/.java src/com/rs/game/player/dialogues/.java src/com/rs/game/tasks/.java src/com/rs/.java src/com/rs/io/.java src/com/rs/net/.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/.java src/com/rs/net/decoders/handlers/.java src/com/rs/net/encoders/.java src/com/rs/tools/.java src/com/rs/utils/.java src/com/rs/utils/huffman/.java src/com/rs/game/npc/godwars/armadyl/*.java
pause

do i have to do anything to that

Read full topic
